text.div:
Argonaut_Appointment_Types

The style of appointment or patient for appointment booking (not service type). These concepts are used in the FHIR Appointment, Schedule and Slot resources. The Argonaut Scheduling Visit Types are mapped to these concepts.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include all codes defined in http://fhir.org/guides/argonaut-scheduling/CodeSystem/appt-type
  • Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v2-0276

name: Argonaut_Appointment_Types
title: Argonaut Appointment Types
description: The style of appointment or patient for appointment booking (not service type).  These concepts are used in the FHIR Appointment, Schedule and Slot resources. The [Argonaut Scheduling Visit Types](ConceptMap-visit-appt-map.html) are mapped to these concepts.

contains.display: A routine check-up, such as an annual physical
A follow up visit from a previous appointment
Routine appointment - default if not valued
